name: If Forest
description: Journey through the magical If Forest where you'll learn to make decisions in your code using if-else statements.

name: Loop Lagoon
description: Dive into Loop Lagoon to master the art of repetition with for and while loops.

name: Function Factory
description: Work in the Function Factory to build reusable code machines using functions and parameters.

name: Array Archipelago
description: Explore the islands of Array Archipelago and learn to organize data in lists and collections.

name: Object Oasis
description: Discover the Object Oasis where you'll create complex data structures and understand object-oriented programming.
